goals__remit:
Support and fight for working class rights 
Create collective aggrements at the workplaces 
Participate at the national tripart dialogue 
Promote working laws 
Provide various services to the  members such as medical, legal and welfare services etc.
relevant_communication: As a Trade Union we use all these tools(communication, projects, events and publication to inform our members, the working people about EU policies and implement the directives for the benefitt of the working class by improving their rights and the their standard of living.
position: HEAD OF THE INTERNATIONAL RELATION DEPARTMENT
